title: This Might Be The First And Last Time We Ever Play This Game!
description:
We always say that if you've stolen from us, you've stolen twice. And today is no different with a new game we're playing. Jimmy Kimmel has started playing the "password" game. Your partner is given a word, and you have to guess the word based on their hints.
We're trying this today with our listeners. But after this, we're not sure we'll play this game ever again. Listen!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
